mapper.select:
select id, code, email, user_name, contact, program_code, total_price, content, create_date, status, pay_date, update_date, del_flag, bpi.images, bpi.title, group_concat(bti.type_name order by bti.type_name asc separator ',') as types, group_concat(bti2.tag_name order by bti2.tag_name asc separator ',') as tags from bs_order_info boi left join bs_program_info bpi on (bpi.code = boi.program_code) left join bs_type_info bti on (bti.code = bpi.type_code) left join bs_tag_info bti2 on (bti2.code = bpi.tag_code) where 1 = 1
AND boi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bsOrderInfo.code},'%')
AND boi.email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bsOrderInfo.email},'%')
AND boi.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bsOrderInfo.userName},'%')
AND boi.status = #{bsOrderInfo.status}
AND bpi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{bsOrderInfo.title},'%')
order by boi.create_date desc
